divs: sighting detailsi took my dog (spanky) out about 10:00m p.m., there was a cat in my aunts yard next door, he saw the cat, then looked up and started barking at the object. i looked up and said "**** **** what the **** is that? (3 words deleted--sgonzalez\cms). it looked like it was on fire, bright red, lava red, on top and orange underneath. it was lower then an airplane would be. i ran to call my son to come down and look at it, we were both saying that is no airplane. we followed it until it started pulsating, faster, then it was gone , and left a puff of black smoke.

Summary: Went to take my dog outside he looked up and started barking at the object.
